content.description:
. . . namque avia cursu

dum sequor et nota excedo regione viarum,

heu misero coniunx fatone erepta Creusa

substitit, erravitne via seu lassa resedit,

incertum. . .
content.question: Briefly explain why Creusa's disappearance is essential to the plot of Books 7-12.

frqParts.text: Briefly explain why Creusa's disappearance is essential to the plot of Books 7-12.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
